verses.verse: When thou goest out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>, and chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and a people <S%H5971><s%> more <S%H7227><s%> than thou, be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is with thee, which brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it shall be, when ye are come nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the battle <S%H4421><s%>, that the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall approach <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8738><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>,

And shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, ye approach <S%H7131><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto battle <S%H4421><s%> against your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: let not your hearts <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H7401><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, and do not tremble <S%H2648><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither be ye terrified <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of them;

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is he that goeth <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with you, to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> for you against your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, to save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8687><s%> you.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What man <S%H376><s%> is there that hath built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and hath not dedicated <S%H2596><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it? let him go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dedicate <S%H2596><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

And what man <S%H376><s%> is he that hath planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and hath not yet eaten <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of it? let him also go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> eat <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of it.

And what man <S%H376><s%> is there that hath betrothed <S%H781><s%> <S%H8765><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and hath not taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her? let him go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> further <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, What man <S%H376><s%> is there that is fearful <S%H3373><s%> and fainthearted <S%H7390><s%> <S%H3824><s%>? let him go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>, lest his brethren's <S%H251><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8735><s%> as well as his heart <S%H3824><s%>.

And it shall be, when the officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they shall make <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of the armies <S%H6635><s%> to lead <S%H7218><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.
When thou comest nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto a city <S%H5892><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against it, then proclaim <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> unto it.

And it shall be, if it make thee answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, and open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, then it shall be, that all the people <S%H5971><s%> that is found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8737><s%> therein shall be tributaries <S%H4522><s%> unto thee, and they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.
And if it will make no peace <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with thee, but will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> against thee, then thou shalt besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it:

And when the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it into thine hands <S%H3027><s%>, thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> every male <S%H2138><s%> thereof with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>:

But the women <S%H802><s%>, and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and all that is in the city <S%H5892><s%>, even all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof, shalt thou take <S%H962><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thyself; and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

Thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the cities <S%H5892><s%> which are very <S%H3966><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%> from thee, which <S%H2007><s%> are not of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>.

But of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of these people <S%H5971><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, thou shalt save alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%> nothing that breatheth <S%H5397><s%>:

But thou shalt utterly <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8687><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them; namely, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee:

That they teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> you not to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after all their abominations <S%H8441><s%>, which they have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>; so should ye sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

When thou shalt besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>, in making war <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against it to take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, thou shalt not destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> thereof by forcing <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an axe <S%H1631><s%> against them: for thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them, and thou shalt not cut them down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> (for the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> is man's <S%H120><s%> life ) to employ <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them in the siege <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4692><s%>:

Only the trees <S%H6086><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that they be not trees <S%H6086><s%> for meat <S%H3978><s%>, thou shalt destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and cut them down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bulwarks <S%H4692><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> that maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with thee, until it be subdued <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
